EmailTemplate.subject: [TO DO]: The last steps before our start
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Thanks again for the call. As discussed, here is an overview of your remaining tasks in Onboarding. Please complete the following tasks prior to our start:
1. Sign contracts and a Power of Attorney
Sign and return your electronic contract package Please print, sign and put your Power of Attorney for Pioneer in your first box pick-up
2. Supply data to unlock Zeitgold Services
Financial Accounting Questionnaire: UNLOCK FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING[INDIVIDUALIZED LINK FROM SALESFORCE] Payroll Accounting Questionnaire: UNLOCK PAYROLL ACCOUNTING [INDIVIDUALIZED LINK FROM SALESFORCE]
3. Inform your current tax consultant and grant contact permissions
Inform your current tax consultant about the switch and define the end of cooperation (if present, also inform payroll consultant(s)) Allow Zeitgold to contact your previous tax consultant
4. Requests from Our Side/Open Questions
[INSERT FROM POST OBC1 MAIL IF RELEVANT]
5. Complete Your First Tasks in the Zeitgold App
Connect your Bank Account(s) in order to use the Zeitgold-Services.
Initial Employee Set-Up "Employee Overview": In order to set-up payroll for your employees, all open tasks in the app relevant to payroll accounting must be correctly completed and confirmed. Open your digital Cash Journal on [START DATE] for the first time and complete it every day. Quick Reminder: Place relevant documents (e.G. Z-Reports, invoices, etc.) in your Zeitgold Box after you have logged them into your Cash Journal.
6. Prepare Your First Box-Pick-Up
On [Day, Date and Timeframe of the first Pick-Up] your first document envelope will be picked up. Please remember to sort your documents into the respective transparent folders and also fill out the form "Preparing Your First Box-Pick-Up" which you also should have received in the Zeitgold Box. Your Zeitgold Web-App (web-based document archive): https://documents.zeitgold.com accessible using the same login data as for the mobile Zeitgold-App
To guarantee our start, please complete these tasks as soon as possible! As always, feel free to contact us at service@zeitgold.com or by phone at 030/30808111.
Best Regards,
{{{Sender.FirstName}}} at Zeitgold
​​​​
